#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {

        long long int n,a,even=0,odd=0,count=0;
        cin>>n;

        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a;

            if(a%2==0)
                even++;

            else
                odd++;
        }

        count=odd*even+(even*(even-1))/2;

        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
     return(0);

}
